attributes.action: Award David Gilmour a Knighthood for contribution to music and charity
attributes.background: Mr Gilmour is a world renowned guitarist and song writter with multi million selling recordings. He has constantly supported multiple charities Inc environmental and homeless charities and has recently sold his guitar collection raising in the region of £17m yet again all for charties

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 
https://www.gov.uk/honours
